There are serious issues facing our country: the #opioidcrisis, a tax code that doesn't work for American workers, a scourge of sex trafficking, & threats from #NorthKorea, #Iran, #Russia & others. We must work together to address these issues.

Americans want results, not partisan bickering. In this highly charged political environment, it is more critical than ever that we in Congress find common ground so that we can successfully address the serious issues we face as a country.

Humbled to receive 3 awards this week: the Panetta Institute’s Jefferson-Lincoln Award for Public Policy, the Jacob K. Javits Prize for Bipartisan Leadership, & the Fetal Alcohol Syndrome (NOFAS) Leadership Award. Encourages me to redouble efforts to achieve results.
